name: save dababy from hitler
description:
this game took my fucking soul so a download would be aprieciated and a comment leaving all the bugs in the game that I will never fix the code is fucking 900 lines idk why but probably cus I'm bad at games but ya this shit is epic if u really like my game consider donate cuz this shit was torture

to play: unzip folder then goto sus-sus-bin-Debug then open sus.exe

story:

u have to save dababy from hitler

controls:

wasd to move, q and e to strafe, and p to shoot

thanks for playing this amazing this game if u want to improve or use my engine all the project files are free to download and u can see the true madness

all art made by me
